item.title: iPhone Audio and Video Sync - Upwork
item.description:
I have a 15 minute interview with audio that needs replaced from the oncam microphone with audio from an iphone recording. I'll supply the video and audio files upon hiring.

I am looking for a skilled professional who can sync an iPhone audio file to a video. The audio file and video are separate, and I need them to be perfectly synchronized. This project requires attention to detail and expertise in audio and video editing. The ideal candidate should have experience working with iPhone audio files and video editing software. The task involves aligning the audio and video tracks, adjusting the timing, and ensuring that the final result is seamless. If you have the necessary skills and expertise, please apply with examples of similar projects you have completed.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, iOS, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, iOS, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Video editor & social media manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are an ecommerce company looking for a video editor and social media manager. We're looking for someone that will take over  the creation and publishing of promotional videos on our social media channels. Your responsibilities would be

Video creation
- Creating CTA slides with 3-4 slides using the provided photoshoot and story materials
- Creating storytime reels with voiceovers
- Creating text post reels
- Premiere Pro experience is preferred (it's where most of our pre-made templates are) but CapCut can be used as an alternative if it's up to the task
- You will be provided raw clips to go through and source the best ones for the specific video/story

Social media management
- Posting 2x a day on TikTok, Instagram and YouTube shorts
- Posting CTA stories 3x a week

Other
- General ecom knowledge (eg language and acronyms used)
- Have an eye for what's trending and trendy


Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: United States

https://app.foreplay.co/share/ads/kr0C2CJhLZteLPL7SUmA?user=Dan%20Ragan

- Our UGC ad agency (http://www.ugcfactory.io) is seeking a part-time video editor responsible for editing VSL's for me.

WHY WORK WITH ME?
- 10+ years experience building organizations from the ground up, managing teams of 15+ full-time employees, ensuring project milestones are hit, and consistently delivering for clients on-time and within budget.
- I'm dedicated to ongoing learning and make sure I share this knowledge with the people I work with. You'll have access to my proprietary database of productivity tools + tutorials + recommendations, something I've invested thousands of hours + dollars to create and regularly maintain.
- Developed automation systems that deliver results with limited resources... and form the backbone of my approach to organization building.

Hourly Range: $40.00

item.title: Video Editor & Creative Strategist | DTC Ecommerce Brand | Meta Ads | UGC & Organic Content - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there,

We are hiring a Content Strategist + Video Editor with a proven track record of success with 2024 Meta ads (9:16). This is for a DTC e-commerce brand within the motherhood niche.

Role Expectations:

- Lead Content Strategy: From Avatar Understanding to Concept Ideation and Content Planning
- Manage Market Research: Niche, Competitor, Customer & Value Propositions
- Video Editing: Turning Raw Content into Kick-Ass Meta Ads in 2024 style (Organic/UGC/TikTok fashion)
- Strong Knowledge of DTC Advertising: Angles, Consumer Psychology & Ad Hooks


Qualifications:

- Seasoned Video Editor: TikTok Style / UGC (trends, sounds, voiceovers, AI, etc)
- Very Creative Person with a Knack for Social Media Marketing
- Excellent Communication Skills to Convey Content Needs


Must-Have Requirements:

- Good Level of English
- Outside-the-Box Mentality regarding Market and Content Research (Meta Ads Library, TikTok Center, Pinterest, Amazon Reviews, Competitors, etc.)
- Fearless Individual, Maniac in the Field, Willing to Challenge the Status Quo and Try New Things
- Confident, Proactive, and Start-Up Mentality (Testing, Iterating, Failing, Succeeding, Rinse and Repeat)
- Demonstrated Hard Work, Eagerness to Learn, and Growth Mindset in a fast-paced environment
- Proven Track Record of Success in Top-Tier Countries (USA, UK, AUS, CA, NZ)
- Lazy Individuals Focused Only on Quick Money Should Not Apply (There will be too many filters in the process, so it's better not to waste each other's time)


What We Offer:

- Direct Collaboration with Company Owners
- Long-Term Potential for Career Growth within the Company if Desired
- Comprehensive Daily Support and Communication

Start your application with the word "unicorn" to show you've read the entire post.

Talk soon,
Steve

P.S. We're not looking for video editors-only professionals, jack-of-all-trades, or 2D/3D animation experts.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Ecommerce, Facebook Advertising, Content Strategy, Creative Strategy, UGC
Skills: Video Editing, Ecommerce, Facebook Advertising, Content Strategy, Creative Strategy, UGC
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Full Time Editor for Stoicism Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Do you want to work for a 120K+ subs youtube channel?
Do you want to be a part of a small team and help us taking the channel to the next level?

We are seeking a full-time editor with expertise in the stoicism niche to produce 30 videos per month. The ideal candidate should have experience in ai image generation midjourney to enhance the visual appeal of the videos. As an editor, you will be responsible for editing the images together in a video. Each image appears about 16-20 seconds on the screen. It does not require much skills to edit the video HOWEVER, you do need to have midjourney or other ai image generation skills. Attention to detail is crucial to maintain the high quality and consistency of our videos. This is a fantastic opportunity for an individual who is passionate about stoicism and wants to contribute to our growing audience. We work in trello so you also need to be open to work in trello. However you don't need to be familiar with trello, since I can show you how it works.
Join our team and have a meaningful impact on our viewers!

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Stoicism knowledge
- AI image generation (midjourney/ or something else that creates high quality images)
- Attention to detail

Budget: $750
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:47 UTC
Category: AI Image Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Editing, AI Image Generation, AI Image Generator, Video Editing
Skills: AI Image Editing, AI Image Generation, AI Image Generator, Video Editing

item.title: Master Video Editor & Story Teller - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
Good Marketing is a digital marketing agency that helps social entrepreneurs get more leads so they can help more people.  If you enjoy working on projects that change people’s lives for the better, then you’re going to love working with us!

Description of the Project:
We are looking for a talented and creative Freelance Video Editor to join our dynamic media team on a project basis. The ideal candidate will have expertise in cutting and editing film footage to create polished and compelling videos that align with our clients’ vision and audience engagement goals. This role requires a high level of technical proficiency and an artistic eye for detail.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with the production team to understand project requirements and specifications.
- Edit video footage to create cohesive and engaging content, incorporating special effects, transitions, and other visual elements as needed.
- Ensure the logical sequencing and smooth running of all video content.
- Review shooting script and raw material to create a shot decision list based on scenes’ value and contribution to continuity.
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film with fine-tuning.
- Add music, voiceover/narration, graphics, and effects to enhance the viewer’s experience.
- Ensure all projects are edited on time for publication deadlines.

Requirements:
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio.
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut, Avid Media Composer).
- Demonstrable video editing ability with a strong portfolio.
- Creative mind and storytelling skills.
- Thorough knowledge of timing, motivation, and continuity.
- Able to cut together a compelling sales message in English with little direction.  
- Familiarity with special effects, 3D, and compositing a plus.

Project Duration:
While this is a short-term assignment, we are looking to build a long-term relationship with the right freelancer.

Note: English fluency is required

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Sales Letter, Social Media Video, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Sales Letter, Social Media Video, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Producer for Shopify App Promotional and Tutorial Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Producer to create a high-quality promotional video and comprehensive tutorial videos for our eCommerce app, Fare Freight. Our goal is to effectively showcase the app's features and functionality, enhancing our Shopify listing and providing clear guidance to our users.

Responsibilities:

Promotional Video:

Create a 2-minute promotional video to be featured on our Shopify listing.
Utilize the provided script to highlight the key features and benefits of the Fare Freight app.
Incorporate engaging visuals, including app screenshots, animations, and other relevant media.
Ensure the video is polished, professional, and aligns with our brand image.
Tutorial Videos:

Develop detailed tutorial videos covering each section of the app.
Use a clear, instructional approach to guide users through the app's functionalities and setup processes.
Include screen recordings, voiceovers, and other visual aids to enhance understanding.
Ensure the videos are easy to follow and professionally edited.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video production and editing, particularly for promotional and tutorial content.
Strong ability to create engaging and visually appealing videos.
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Experience in creating content for eCommerce or app-based products is a plus.
Excellent communication skills to understand and implement our vision effectively.
Additional Information:

We will provide the script for the promotional video and any additional media required.
The candidate will have access to our app demo to capture necessary screenshots and understand the app’s features.
The promotional video should be no longer than 2 minutes, while the tutorial videos can vary in length depending on the complexity of each section.
To Apply:

Please provide examples of previous promotional and tutorial videos you have produced, especially those related to eCommerce or app-based products. Include a brief cover letter detailing your experience and how you can contribute to our project.

We look forward to collaborating with a talented video producer who can help us effectively showcase the Fare Freight app and provide valuable instructional content to our users.

Agencies or generic proposal will be overlocked

Hourly Range: $22.00-$28.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:41 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, Slide Animation, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Animation, Education
Skills: Short Video Ad, Slide Animation, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Animation, Education
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Create 30sec TV Commercial Video for Dental Practice - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to create a 30-second TV commercial video for our dental practice. The video should effectively showcase our services and highlight the benefits of choosing our practice. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating compelling videos, excellent storytelling skills, and a keen eye for detail.
    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Motion graphics
    - Scriptwriting
    - Storyboarding
    - Video production
    - Creative thinking
    
  Script to include some in the lines of:
Is your smile effecting your confidence

Don’t wait Decades
At Magical Smiles Dental It can be fixed in days
With Simple affordable payment options
Book your free consultation today!

Concerned about your child’s teeth / jaw growth
Explore our Straight Teeth No-Braces treatment at Magical Smiles
Correct the root cause that causes crocked teeth and narrow jaws
Avoid braces in most cases
Book your checkup today


Budget: $30
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:35 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Videography
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: VSL, UGC, and creating ads for DTC brands in general. - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for editors to join my team. Specifically, I'm looking for a video and photo editor who is familiar with social media ads, VSL, UGC, and creating ads for DTC brands in general.

If you are interested in joining my team, I have a test ready to see if you fit the position. This test involves creating a small part of an advertisement similar to the ones we produce for our brands and some clients' brands. I will provide you with all the necessary information, including the script, approach, example ad, and other instructions to create this ad. The full ad duration is two minutes, but 20-30 seconds will be enough for the test to evaluate your fit.

I am looking for someone to work closely with me for about 4 hours a day.

If you're interested, please let me know your hourly rate (even if you don't usually work hourly, just to get an idea of whether we can work out a deal) and when you could start the test.

Thank you!


Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Music video/art - Upwork
item.description:
I make music. I need a music video. Specifically, I need an animation of a man that has starts out "black and white" walking through a forest/nature and then as the song gets brighter, more colors show. Once the end of the track hits, I want it to be bright and pastel.

I require good communication, initiative, creative mindset and positive approach. Attached is the song. Willing to negotiate pending skillset and initiative/creative mindset that matches this project. There will be more projects in future if you do well. Thank you.

Hourly Range: $28.00-$46.00

item.title: 🚨Thumbnail Editor - Youtube - Long Term🚨 - Upwork
item.description:
READ!

We are searching for a long term Thumbnial editor.
We offer a lot of growth potential within the company so we are looking for someone who is willing to climb up the ladder!

Payment:
You'll get 10$ per thumbnail wich means you earn based on performance. We supply an unlimited amount of thumbnails wich means you earn as much as you want.

Adaptability:
We are the owners of multiple Youtube channels, all channels work with different styles, and we also start new channels ones in a while wich requires someone who is willing to learn and invest his/hers own time into learning the craft of a specefic niche.

Availability:
We are looking for someone who is broadly available and does not have another fulltime job on the side.

Are you an A-Player?
We are only looking for A-Players; People with  ambition and motivation to excel. They set high standards for themselves and continually strive for excellence in everything they do.

If you want to grow and excell within our company send us a BLANK proposal with only a link to a LOOM Video introducing yourself and speaking about your knowledge on Youtube thumbnials + explaining why you want to work with us.

Please deliver 3 test thumbnials in your cover letter, based on the following 3 channels:
We will not use these thumbnails for anything, you can even put a watermark over it. we just need to see if your able to take over a style. ANY Other Proposal will be ignored.

https://youtube.com/@centraldiscovery34486?si=r7aaEhQyROKQh1dY

https://youtube.com/@beyonddiscoveryofficial?si=XW_k0XeNjOB7M9uV (James’s Webb topic)

https://youtube.com/@matterspace?si=VWF5i9_foQxbgOGa


NEEDS To be proficient with and have Midjourney!

I hope to meet you soon, so we can get to the top together.



Budget: $100
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:18 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Adobe Photoshop
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Social media manager to edit and post - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a social media manager to manage my couple (me and my fiance) instagram and tik tok. I need someone who is creative, and someone who can keep up with social trends. Also need some who is fluent in english. I need some one who will be able to notice the trends and edit the videos to be like the trends so the videos can go viral. I need someone who uses apple products as we will send all the content on icloud.

We will provide all the content.

Ideally we woiuld want to post 5 times a week. on both platfroms.

Budget $50-60 a month.

Budget: $50

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to join our team and edit our YouTube videos in the same style as our current videos (Exploding Topics).

The ideal candidate should have experience in editing YouTube content and a strong understanding of YouTube trends and audience preferences.

The main responsibilities include trimming and arranging footage, adding transitions and effects, syncing audio, and ensuring the final output is ready to be uploaded to YouTube.

The successful candidate should be proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and After Affects.

Important note: this project is for a small test project.

We will send you a folder containing video, audio and screenshots. And you will create a 30 second video from that. The candidate that does the best job with the test project will be hired to produce all of our videos moving forward (we can figure out your hourly rate or rate per video then).

To help us filter through automated submissions, please put the name of the CEO of Spotify at the top of your proposal.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
